Name: GraFi Valentine
About the game: GraFi Valentine - casual, colorful, minimalist, physical puzzle with traps, treadmills, portals, hearts and changing gravity. Player goal is to relocate red coin, using only the change of gravity, on the red rock and keep for some time to pass the level. In GraFi Valentine: - Traps - Changing gravity - Cool Soundtrack - Achievements - Valentine's Day art - Treadmills - Portal's - Hearts - 50 levels
